title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.6 - Schedule of payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.6 - Schedule of payments

State Regulations

Except for aid and grants to the State University of New

York, after approval of applications, the payment schedule shall be as
follows: (a) Fifty percent of the
allocation or grant amount shall be paid upon approval of the application and
budget. (b) Forty percent of the
allocation or grant amount shall be paid at the mid-point of the project or of
the service provided. (c) Ten
percent of the allocation or grant shall be paid upon submission of an
acceptable final report on the work carried out. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
189.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
